org.teatrove.trove.io
Interface ByteData

All Known Subinterfaces:
ByteBuffer, CharToByteBuffer
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayByteData, DefaultByteBuffer, DefaultCharToByteBuffer, FastCharToByteBuffer, FileByteBuffer, FileByteData, InternedCharToByteBuffer, SpilloverByteBuffer
public interface ByteData

Simple interface for writing a list of bytes to an OutputStream.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill

Method Summary
 long getByteCount()
          Return the amount of bytes that will be written by the writeTo method.
 void reset()
          Reset any transient data stored in this ByteData.
 void writeTo(OutputStream out)
          Writes all the bytes to the given OutputStream.
 

Method Detail

getByteCount

long getByteCount()
                  throws IOException
Return the amount of bytes that will be written by the writeTo method.

Throws:
IOException

writeTo

void writeTo(OutputStream out)
             throws IOException
Writes all the bytes to the given OutputStream.

Throws:
IOException

reset

void reset()
           throws IOException
Reset any transient data stored in this ByteData. A call to getByteCount or writeTo will force this data to be restored.

Throws:
IOException
